DOC.brief_summary: We will determine if linezolid inhibits cellular activation and production of pro-inflammatory cytokines, providing mechanistic rationale for its clinical efficacy and the justification for further investigations in S. Aureus sepsis.
DOC.brief_title: The Effects of Linezolid and Vancomycin on Inflammation and Cellular Signaling Vents
DOC.criteria: Healthy, taking no medications, and not recently hospitalized Infection (active)
